article.title: BAE to Provide Engineering Services for Radar Warning Receivers
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: BAE Systems Information and Electronic Systems Integration, Totowa, N.J., is being awarded a $9,757,853 contract modification for engineering services for the AN/ALR-56C system. The contracting activity is the Air Force Sustainment Center, Robins Air Force Base, Ga.
